roleset.name: perform better
roleset.note: OUTPERFORM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'outperform' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with other 'out...' verbs (outrun, outpace, etc). (from outperform.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: isolated example?
example.text: ...[many software and semiconductor stocks]-1 have continued *trace*-1 to outperform the market.
